Author: Hibiki Yamazaki
Name: Prison Life is Easy for a Villainess

Chapters.Name: Chapter 1: The Young Lady Moves
Chapters.EndsBeforeLine: 01: The Young Lady Is Sent to Prison

Chapters.Name: 01: The Young Lady Is Sent to Prison

SubSections.StartsAtLine: 01: The Young Lady Is Sent to Prison
SubSections.EndsAtLine: This was an unusual show of emotion—a look of scorn—from the duke’s daughter who was known for her placidity. But before the prince could dwell on what it meant, Sykes dragged Rachel from the banquet hall.
Fighting the urge to start skipping, Rachel trudged out of the hall with heavy feet that belied her actual feelings.

Chapters.Name: 04: The Duke Realizes the Situation

SubSections.EndsAtLine: A number of servants had gathered around the two of them, but they’d all been with the family far too long to comment on the current situation.

Chapters.Name: Chapter 6: So Long, Sykes
29: The Young Lady’s Basement Session

SubSections.EndsAtLine: The chief lady-in-waiting escorted the impromptu band out, with the exception of Rachel, and lectured them until morning.
Shrugging it off, Rachel readied her pillow and turned out the lights.

Chapters.Name: 34: The Young Lady Does Nothing Because She is in Prison

SubSections.StartsAtLine: 34: The Young Lady Does Nothing Because She is in Prison
SubSections.EndsAtLine: This was no time to be reacting to her own jokes. She needed to find somewhere to hide before she ran out of breath, so Margaret kept deliberately running into tight places.
Unable to imagine a future full of anything but sadness, the elite knights all slumped in despair.
